title: Welcome
text:
SARA Statistics Winter School

Around 30 hours of residential teaching for 5 days.
No tuition fee. But 1 week food & accommodation charges Rs.6000.
First 10 participants are given 10% discount on the food and accommodation fee as well.
Feedback on the last day of the event.
Thank You Ceremony! on Friday, 07 MAR 2024, 6-7 PM üöÇ
e-Certificate of the participation via email.
